2025-11-18T17:23:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to malfunction of traffic lights at the junction of Wang Chiu Road and Sheung Yee Road, motorists are advised to drive with utmost care when passing through the road junction, pay extra attention to the traffic signs and safety of pedestrians. Pedestrians please pay attention to vehicles when crossing Tsui Ping Road with malfunctioned traffic lights.
2025-11-18T17:23:00.CONTENT_CN: 由於宏照道和常怡道交界的交通燈失靈，駕駛人士在駛經有關路口時，請加倍小心，注意交通標誌的指示並留意過路行人的安全。行人在交通燈失靈的翠屏道橫過馬路時，請特別注意車輛。

2025-11-18T18:06:00.CONTENT_EN: Traffic lights at the junction of Wang Chiu Road and Sheung Yee Road have resumed normal.
2025-11-18T18:06:00.CONTENT_CN: 位於宏照道和常怡道交界的交通燈已恢復正常運作。

2025-11-19T00:38:00.CONTENT_EN: Lantau Link: Due to strong wind, the following temporary traffic measure is implemented on Lantau Link: The speed limit of Lantau Link is reduced to 50km/h. Ting Kau Bridge: Due to strong wind, the following temporary traffic arrangement is implemented on Ting Kau Bridge: The speed limit of Ting Kau Bridge is reduced to 50km/h. Members of the public are advised to watch out for the latest traffic news through radio and television broadcasts, and for the traffic signs on site.
2025-11-19T00:38:00.CONTENT_CN: 青嶼幹線： 由於強風關係，青嶼幹線已實施下列臨時交通措施： 青嶼幹線的車速限制降至每小時50 公里。 汀九橋： 由於強風關係，汀九橋已實施下列臨時交通措施： 汀九橋的車速限制降至每小時50 公里。 市民請留意電台/電視廣播的最新交通消息，以及現場的交通標誌。

2025-11-19T02:44:00.CONTENT_EN: Lantau Link temporary traffic arrangements cancellation: The Stage 1 temporary traffic arrangements which were implemented before in the Lantau Link are cancelled. Ting Kau Bridge temporary traffic arrangements cancellation: The Stage 1 temporary traffic arrangements which were implemented before in the Ting Kau Bridge are cancelled. Members of the public are advised to watch out for the latest traffic news through radio and television broadcasts, and for the traffic signs on site.
2025-11-19T02:44:00.CONTENT_CN: 青嶼幹線臨時交通管理措施取消： 較早前於青嶼幹線實施的第一階段臨時交通管理措施現已取消。 汀九橋臨時交通管理措施取消： 較早前於汀九橋實施的第一階段臨時交通管理措施現已取消。 市民請留意電台/電視廣播的最新交通消息，以及現場的交通標誌。

2025-11-19T18:22:00.CONTENT_EN:
The following road sections are busy:
Hong Kong Island
– Connaught Road Central flyover (Western Harbour Crossing bound)

Kowloon
– East Kowloon Corridor (Tsim Sha Tsui bound)
– Kwun Tong Bypass (Yau Tong bound)
– Lei Yue Mun Road (Eastern Harbour Crossing bound)

New Territories
– Tai Po Road - Sha Tin (Tai Po bound)

Motorists passing through the above road sections are advised to drive with utmost care and patience.
2025-11-19T18:22:00.CONTENT_CN:
以下路段的交通繁忙:
香港島
–干諾道中天橋(往西區海底隧道方向)

九龍

–觀塘繞道(往油塘方向)
–鯉魚門道(往東區海底隧道方向)

新界
–大埔公路　–　沙田段(往大埔方向)

駕駛人士行經上述路段敬請忍讓及小心駕駛。

2025-11-19T21:10:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to high wind , the following special traffic and transport arrangements have been implemented on Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macao Bridge Hong Kong Link Road (HZMB HKLR), with details as shown below: The speed limit of the HZMB HKLR is lowered from 100 km/h to 50 km/h.

2025-11-21T08:48:00.CONTENT_EN: Fortune Ferry Company Limited Due to malfunction of lift system in WestK Quay, "West Kowloon – Central" ferry service is supended until further notice.
2025-11-21T08:48:00.CONTENT_CN: 富裕小輪有限公司 因西九碼頭升降台故障，「中環－西九龍」線暫停服務，復航時間待定

2025-11-21T09:02:00.CONTENT_EN:
The following ferry service which was suspended due to malfunction of lift system in WestK Quay will be or have been resumed:
Fortune Ferry Company Limited
-Central to West Kowloon : resumed at 09:00 am
-West Kowloon to Central : resumes at 09:15 am.
2025-11-21T09:02:00.CONTENT_CN:
較早前因受西九碼頭升降台故障而停航的以下渡輪服務將會或已經恢復服務:
富裕小輪有限公司
-中環至西九龍:上午09時00分恢復
-西九龍至中環:上午09時15分恢復。

description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: Special traffic and transport arrangements for Cross Harbour Race in Wan Chai North and Tsim Sha Tsui
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 為配合渡海泳比賽灣仔北及尖沙咀特別交通及運輸安排

2025-11-21T12:36:00.CONTENT_EN: Special traffic and transport arrangements would be implemented in Wan Chai North and Tsim Sha Tsui to facilitate the holding of the Cross Harbour Race 2025 on November 22. For details of the special traffic and public transport arrangements, members of the public may visit the TD's website (https://www. td. gov. hk/filemanager/en/content_13/TDN_%20Victoria%20Harbour%20Race%202025_Eng. pdf) or its mobile application "HKeMobility". Passengers may also refer to the passenger notices displayed by the relevant public transport operators.
2025-11-21T12:36:00.CONTENT_CN: 為配合十一月二十二日舉行的二○二五年渡海泳比賽，灣仔北及尖沙咀實施特別交通及運輸安排，詳情可瀏覽運輸署網頁（https://www.td.gov.hk/filemanager/en/content_13/TDN_%20Victoria%20Harbour%20Race%202025_Chi.pdf）、「香港出行易」流動應用程式或參閱相關公共運輸營辦商所發出的乘客通告。

2025-11-21T15:05:00.CONTENT_EN:
Special traffic and transport arrangements will be implemented in phases at various locations on Hong Kong Island, in Kowloon East and Tseung Kwan O from 1am Sunday (23 November) to facilitate the holding of the Hong Kong Streetathon 2025. 

Motorists should pay particular attention to the road closures and public transport arrangements at Lung Wo Road, the Central-Wan Chai Bypass, Island Eastern Corridor, Eastern Harbour Crossing, Tseung Lam Highway, Cha Kwo Ling Road, Kwun Tong Bypass, Hoi Bun Road and Kai Fuk Road. 

Due to extensive road closures, the TD anticipates that traffic will be very congested. Motorists are advised to avoid driving to the affected/ congested areas unless absolutely necessary. Besides, in view of the road closures, bus and Green Minibus routes observing the above roads will also be affected and subject to diversion, truncation or relocation of stops in phases. 

For details of the special traffic and public transport arrangements to be implemented on the event day, please refer to the Transport Department Notice
(https://www. td. gov. hk/filemanager/en/content_13/WCO/tdn_hkstreetathon25_eng. pdf).
2025-11-21T15:05:00.CONTENT_CN:
為配合舉行香港街馬2025，香港島、九龍東及將軍澳多處在周日（十一月二十三日）凌晨一時起分階段實施特別交通及運輸安排。

駕駛人士請特別留意活動當日在龍和道、中環及灣仔繞道、東區走廊、東區海底隧道、將藍公路、茶果嶺道、觀塘繞道、海濱道及啟福道的封路安排。

運輸署預計大範圍封路將會令交通非常擠塞，駕駛人士如非必要，請不要駕車前往受影響的地區。此外，行經上述路段的巴士及專線小巴路線亦會因應封路安排分階段實施改道、縮短路線或遷站安排。

有關活動當日實施特別交通及運輸安排的詳細資料，請參閱運輸署公告(https://www.td.gov.hk/filemanager/en/content_13/WCO/tdn_hkstreetathon25_tc.pdf)。
